cashflow.subtitle: Expense tracking
cashflow.presentation: CashFlow is an iOS application that helps you manage your expenses and money in general.

cyclo.subtitle: Bike ride tracking
cyclo.presentation: Cyclo is an iOS application that tracks bike rides recorded on the Apple Watch.

ecoTime.subtitle: iPhone usage tracking
ecoTime.presentation: EcoTime is an iOS application that monitors iPhone screen time.

split.subtitle: Shared expenses with friends
split.presentation: Split is an iOS and Android application that allows you to share your expenses.

tyradex.subtitle: Pokédex
tyradex.presentation: Tyradex is an iOS, iPadOS, and VisionOS application that provides access to the Pokédex via TyradexKit.

tyradexKit.subtitle: Pokédex
tyradexKit.presentation: TyradexKit is a library that uses a French API to access the Pokédex.

neopixl.title: iOS Developer
neopixl.description: Neoxipl are experts to support and guide you in the creation of your mobile app from A to Z. We are a team of passionate developers who are always looking for the best solutions to meet your needs.

efluid.title: Information Systems Tester
efluid.description: Efluid is a software company that provides solutions for the energy sector. I was in charge of testing the information systems developed by the company.

antares.title: Technician Helpdesk
antares.description: Antares is a company that provides IT services to other companies. I was in charge of providing technical support to users.

master.title: Master's degree in Management and Computer Science
master.description: The Master's degree in Management and Computer Science is a two-year program that provides students with the skills and knowledge needed to work as IT project managers.

bachelor.title: Bachelor's degree in Full Stack Web Development
bachelor.description: The Bachelor's degree in Full Stack Web Development is a one-year program that provides students with the skills and knowledge needed to work as full stack web developers.

bts.title: Advanced Technician's Certificate in System and Network Administration
bts.description: The BTS in System and Network Administration is a two-year program that provides students with the skills and knowledge needed to work as system and network administrators.
